an2.98:1.3: Yo ca anagatam bharam vahati, yo ca agatam bharam na vahati.
an2.99:1.3: Yo ca anagatam bharam na vahati, yo ca agatam bharam vahati.
an2.100:1.3: Yo ca akappiye kappiyasanni, yo ca kappiye akappiyasanni.
an2.101:1.3: Yo ca akappiye akappiyasanni, yo ca kappiye kappiyasanni.
an2.102:1.3: Yo ca anapattiya apattisanni, yo ca apattiya anapattisanni.
an2.103:1.3: Yo ca anapattiya anapattisanni, yo ca apattiya apattisanni.
an2.104:1.3: Yo ca adhamme dhammasanni, yo ca dhamme adhammasanni.
an2.105:1.3: Yo ca dhamme dhammasanni, yo ca adhamme adhammasanni.
an2.106:1.3: Yo ca avinaye vinayasanni, yo ca vinaye avinayasanni.
an2.107:1.3: Yo ca avinaye avinayasanni, yo ca vinaye vinayasanni.
an2.108:1.3: Yo ca na kukkuccayitabbam kukkuccayati, yo ca kukkuccayitabbam na kukkuccayati.
an2.108:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam asava vaddhanti”ti.
an2.109:1.3: Yo ca na kukkuccayitabbam na kukkuccayati, yo ca kukkuccayitabbam kukkuccayati.
an2.109:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam asava na vaddhanti”ti.
an2.110:1.3: Yo ca akappiye kappiyasanni, yo ca kappiye akappiyasanni.
an2.110:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam asava vaddhanti”ti.
an2.111:1.3: Yo ca akappiye akappiyasanni, yo ca kappiye kappiyasanni.
an2.111:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam asava na vaddhanti”ti.
an2.112:1.3: Yo ca apattiya anapattisanni, yo ca anapattiya apattisanni.
an2.112:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam asava vaddhanti”ti.
an2.113:1.3: Yo ca apattiya apattisanni, yo ca anapattiya anapattisanni.
an2.113:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam asava na vaddhanti”ti.
an2.114:1.3: Yo ca adhamme dhammasanni, yo ca dhamme adhammasanni.
an2.114:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam asava vaddhanti”ti.
an2.115:1.3: Yo ca dhamme dhammasanni, yo ca adhamme adhammasanni.
an2.115:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam asava na vaddhanti”ti.
an2.116:1.3: Yo ca avinaye vinayasanni, yo ca vinaye avinayasanni.
an2.116:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam asava vaddhanti”ti.
an2.117:1.3: Yo ca avinaye avinayasanni, yo ca vinaye vinayasanni.
an2.117:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam asava na vaddhanti”ti.
